titles: Remarks on remarks, or, The Rector of Bury's sermon vindicated his charge exhibited against the dissenters for endeavouring to corrupt the word of God justified and farther confirmed : also the absurdities and notorious falsities of Mr. Owen and other pretended ministers of the Gospel are detected and expos'd / by Thomas Gipps, Rector of Bury.
author: Gipps, Thomas, d. 1709.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Owen, James, 1654-1706. --  Remarks on a sermon, about corrupting the Word of God.
